resources.string: Kamu bisa mengecek kualitas biji kopi kamu.
Kamu juga bisa mengetahui penyakit tanamanmu.

Here is an explanation of some of the buttons : 
 👉🏻 back button to return to previous page 
 👉🏻 information button to display additional information 
 👉🏻 gallery button to upload image from gallery 
 👉🏻 shutter button to take a picture using the camera 
 👉🏻 switch button to rotate camera lens

How to fix it : 
 👉🏻 Protect plants with a green house, thus flies and other insects cannot enter the garden area. 
 👉🏻 Install insect traps or yellow traps on plant areas. 
 👉🏻 On plants that have already been attacked by leaf miners, cut the petioles that have been attacked by the pest and then burned. 
 👉🏻 Carry out biological control by spraying with vegetable pesticides so that no chemical residues are left on the plants. 
 👉🏻 Lakukan pengendalian secara alamiah dengan cara melakukan rotasi tanaman, lakukan penanaman dengan jenis tanaman yang berganti-ganti.

How to fix it : 
 👉🏻 Biological Control : The disease can be controlled by spraying copper oxychloride (0.3%) right after the appearance of the first symptoms and subsequent sprays at 20-day intervals. Treating fruits with neem leaf extract with a combination of cold storage completely inhibits the growth of a series of pathogens on fruits during storage. 
 👉🏻 Chemical Control : Always consider an integrated approach with preventive measures along with biological treatments if available. Spraying fungicides after the initial appearance, followed by 0.3% miltox at 20-day intervals work well to curb the fungus. 
 👉🏻 Precautions : Clean the storage facility thoroughly to avoid mold growth during storage.

How to fix it : 
 👉🏻 Biological Control : Bioinsecticides based on species Bacillus subtilis, Arthrobacter and Streptomyces have a noticeable effect in inhibiting the progression of the disease. 
 👉🏻 Chemical Control :Always consider an integrated approach with preventive measures along with biological treatments. Triazole and strobilurin fungicides show promising results in controlling chickpea rust. 
 👉🏻 Precautions : 
 1. Plant resistant or tolerant varieties. 
 2. Do not plant chickpeas in infected places. 
 3. Intercrop with non-host plants such as corn. 
 4. Remove weeds and wild plants from the field. 
 5. Avoid over-irrigation and do not use bulk sprinklers. 
 6. Cut and remove all infected parts of the plant. 
 7. After planting, clean and remove all plant debris. 
 8. Choose and schedule planting and irrigation dates carefully to avoid prolonged leaf wetting when temperatures are high. 9. Avoid excessive nitrogen use and ensure adequate potassium fertilization.
